    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602300.64</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Vier Fragen zum Thema "Tropenholz"</string>
            <string language="en">Four questions on "Tropical Wood"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quatre questions sur "le bois tropical"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quatro perguntas "na madeira tropical"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quattro domande "su legno tropicale"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέσσερις ερωτήσεις στο "τροπικό ξύλο"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuatro preguntas sobre la "madera tropical"</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Gegenüberstellung von Argumenten zum Thema Tropenholz aus Sicht der Holzindustrie und der Regenwaldschützer.</string>
            <string language="en">Comparison of contrary statements on tropical wood from the view of representatives of the wood industry and from the view of rain forest activists.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Tropen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Wald</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Tropenholz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tropics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tropical wood</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparaison des rapports contraires sur le bois 
tropical de la vue des représentants de l'industrie en bois et de la 
vue des activistes de forêt tropicale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comparação de indicações contrárias na 
madeira tropical da vista dos representantes da indústria de madeira 
e da opinião activistas da floresta de chuva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronto delle istruzione contrarie su legno 
tropicale dalla vista dei rappresentanti dell'industria di legno e dal
punto di vista degli attivisti della foresta di pioggia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγκριση των αντίθετων δηλώσεων στο τροπικό ξύλο από
την όψη των αντιπροσώπων της ξύλινης βιομηχανίας και από την όψη
των ενεργών στελεχών τροπικών δασών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comparación de declaraciones contrarias sobre la
madera tropical de la vista de representantes de la industria de 
madera y de la opinión los activistas de la selva tropical.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tropiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bois tropical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tropics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foresta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legno tropicale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροπικοί κύκλοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δάσος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροπικό ξύλο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bosque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Madera tropical</string>
          </keyword>
